postComments.noCommentsDesc: No comments on this post yet.

commentDetails.notFoundDesc: The requested comment was not found.
commentDetails.replyPlaceholder: Write your reply to this comment...
commentDetails.note: Note: When you send the reply, it will be saved in the database and automatically sent to Facebook as a reply to the original comment.

commentSettings.description: Configure how to auto-reply to Facebook comments
commentSettings.autoReplyTemplateDesc: You can customize the default reply that will be sent when AI is disabled or unavailable.
commentSettings.templateHint: This reply will be used when AI is disabled or reply generation fails.
commentSettings.aiPromptDesc: You can customize the prompt used by AI for comment replies instead of the default prompt.
commentSettings.aiPromptHint: If left empty, the default AI Agent prompt will be used.
commentSettings.fixedMessagesDesc: You can specify different replies for the comment and the messenger message.
commentSettings.fixedCommentPlaceholder: Enter the fixed reply that will appear on the comment...
commentSettings.fixedMessengerPlaceholder: Enter the fixed message that will be sent in Messenger...
commentSettings.messengerVariationsDesc: Add several variations for the messages that will be sent in Messenger for variety.

postSettings.fallbackWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Fallback mode: Settings are stored locally until the database is running
postSettings.aiDesc: Automatically reply using AI trained on your products/services
postSettings.fixedDesc: Reply with a pre-defined message to all comments
postSettings.manualDesc: Reply manually to each comment individually
postSettings.enterAIPrompt: Enter a custom AI prompt for this post...
postSettings.aiPromptHint: If left empty, the default AI Agent prompt will be used
postSettings.fixedMessengerPlaceholder: Enter the message that will be sent in Messenger...
postSettings.applyResponse: Apply response method to pending comments
postSettings.applyResponseDisabled: Apply response method (not available in fallback mode)
postSettings.aiHow: Analyzes each comment individually and provides a tailored response based on the comment content and your products.
postSettings.fixedHow: Sends the same pre-defined message as a reply to all pending comments.
postSettings.manualHow: You can reply to each comment individually manually as usual.
postSettings.tipChangeAnyTime: You can change the response method at any time
postSettings.tipAffectsPendingOnly: Applying the response method only affects pending comments
postSettings.tipAlreadyRepliedUnaffected: Comments that have already been replied to will not be affected

display.title: Customize Variant Display
display.description: Choose how variants (colors, sizes) are displayed to customers on the product page. These settings are specific to this product only and override global settings.
display.noVariationAttributesDesc: Add attributes like "Color" or "Size" in the Attributes tab first.
display.customizeImageLabel: You can customize an image for each value (e.g., fabric photo for red color). These images will appear when selecting "Color Circles" or "Thumbnails" style.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.featuredHint: Product will appear on homepage and featured sections

advanced.excludeFromFreeShippingHint: Will not be eligible for free shipping offers even if order reaches minimum amount

advanced.showAddToCart: Show Add to Cart button on product page

advanced.sizeGuideHint: You can add a size guide table for the product. It will be displayed to customers on the product page.
advanced.recommendedProductsDesc: Select specific products to display as recommendations. They will be merged with automatic system recommendations.
advanced.relatedProductsDesc: Products from the same category or similar to the current product
advanced.upsellProductsDesc: Better and more expensive products to encourage customer upgrade
advanced.crosssellProductsDesc: Products typically purchased with this product
advanced.enterProductId: Enter product ID and press Enter

products.title: Product Notifications
products.backInStock: Notify when a product requested by customer is back in stock
products.backInStockHelp: A notification is sent to customers who requested to be notified when the product is available
products.priceDrop: Notify when a product price drops
products.priceDropHelp: A notification is sent to customers who viewed the product or added it to favorites
products.newProduct: Notify when a new product is added
products.newProductHelp: A notification is sent to all customers subscribed to marketing

abandonedCart.title: Abandoned Cart Notifications
abandonedCart.desc: Automated reminders are sent to customers who left products in the shopping cart without completing the purchase
abandonedCart.incentiveDiscountDesc: Send a discount coupon with the last reminder
abandonedCart.discountHelp: A discount coupon is automatically created and sent to the customer

marketing.title: Marketing Notifications
marketing.complianceWarning: Make sure you have customer consent before sending marketing messages to avoid being banned
marketing.coupons: Notify when a coupon is sent to a customer
marketing.birthday: Send a birthday greeting to customers
marketing.loyalty: Notify on earning loyalty points or level change

hr.title: HR Notifications

paymentAnalytics.title: Payment Methods Analytics

paymentAnalytics.basicAnalyticsNotice: These are basic analytics for payment methods. For advanced analytics (failure rate, processing time) see roadmap.

advancedAnalyticsPlan.title: Advanced Analytics Plan
advancedAnalyticsPlan.subtitle: Analytics requiring additional development with proposed implementation plan

profit.title: Profit Analytics
profit.description: True net profit after all costs
profit.whyMissing: Requires product cost (COGS), which is not available in WooCommerce by default
backendPlan: Add costPrice field to products table
Create endpoint for profit calculation: revenue - COGS - shipping - fees
Add API for bulk cost updates

cogs.title: Cost of Goods Sold (COGS)
cogs.description: Track costs per product to calculate margins
cogs.whyMissing: WooCommerce doesn't store product cost, only sale price

ads.title: Ads Cost Tracking
ads.description: Link ad costs to orders for ROAS calculation

funnel.title: Funnel Analytics
funnel.description: Customer journey tracking from visit to purchase
funnel.whyMissing: Requires site event tracking (views, cart, checkout)
trackingPlan: Log: views, cart actions, checkout, purchase

cod.title: COD Performance Analytics
cod.whyMissing: Requires delivery status and rejection reasons

regions.title: Governorate/Region Analytics
regions.description: Sales and delivery performance by area

customer-quality.title: Customer Quality Score
customer-quality.description: Segment customers by behavior and value

product-health.title: Product Health Score
product-health.description: Rate products by performance and profit
product-health.whyMissing: Requires product cost and return data

returns.title: Return & Refund Analytics
returns.whyMissing: Requires recording return reasons per order
backendPlan: Link returns to products for issue identification

team.title: Team Performance Analytics
backendPlan: Log userId for all status changes

aiToolsDesign.title: AI Tools
aiToolsDesign.subtitle: Proposed design and architecture for system AI tools
aiToolsDesign.noticeText: This page shows the proposed design for AI tools. **There is no actual AI logic currently** - this is a plan for future development.
aiToolsDesign.phase1Desc: **Smart Alerts + Fraud Detection** - Essentials that protect against losses
aiToolsDesign.phase2Desc: **Sales Forecast + Profit Forecast** - Planning and prediction
aiToolsDesign.phase3Desc: **Smart Recommendations + Campaign Killswitch** - Optimization and automation

profit-forecast.title: Profit Forecast
profit-forecast.description: Use AI to predict future profits based on historical data

sales-forecast.title: Sales Forecast
sales-forecast.description: Predict sales volume for each product/category to improve inventory management
features: Identify products about to go out of stock

auto-alerts.title: Smart Alerts
auto-alerts.description: Automated alert system that detects problems before they escalate

smart-recommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
smart-recommendations.description: Personalized suggestions to increase sales and average order value

fraud-detection.title: Fraud Detection
fraud-detection.description: Detect fake and suspicious orders before shipping

campaign-killswitch.title: Campaign Killswitch
campaign-killswitch.description: Automatic shutdown of unprofitable advertising campaigns

warnings.title: Warning: Approaching Usage Limits
warnings.message: You are approaching your plan limits. Consider upgrading to avoid service interruption.

errors.exportFailed: An error occurred while exporting activities
